text_logic_form: Line $AB$ is tangent to the circle $X$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AE$ is $2$ units.
The length of the line $EC$ is $5$ units.
The length of the line $DE$ is $4$ units.
The length of the line $BE$ is $x$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
Point $E$ also lies on the line connecting $D$ and $C$.
Point $A$ lies on the circumference of circle $X$ with radius $4$.
Point $B$ also lies on the circumference of circle $X$.
Point $C$ also lies on the circumference of circle $X$.
Point $D$ also lies on the circumference of circle $X$.

point_positions.X: Center of the circle X is positioned at (86.0, 86.0).

circle_instances: There is a circle with center at point X.
